sources.title: Drums in the Deep South
sources.description: A small Confederate unit is ordered to prevent the passage of Federal trains for as long as possible. The IMDB entry is here . (The video is interlaced in the MPEG2 file. If viewing with VLC, deinterlace with menu-path Video/Deinterlace/Blend.)

sources.title: Drums in the Deep South (1951) BARBARA PAYTON
sources.description:
Stars: Barbara Payton, Guy Madison, James Craig
Director: William Cameron Menzies

Two old friends find themselves on opposite sides during the Civil War in a desperate battle atop an impregnable mountain.Co-stars Hollywood bad-girl BARBARA PAYTON.

sources.title: Drums in the Deep South (1951) War Western Movie, Starring Barbara Payton, James Craig
sources.description:
A handful of heroes on a powder-keg mountain !
Two old friends find themselves on opposite sides during the Civil War in a desperate battle atop an impregnable mountain.

Original title: Drums in the Deep South (1951) Alternative title: The Confederate Story

Director: William Cameron Menzies
Writers: Philip Yordan, Sidney Harmon
Stars: James Craig, Barbara Payton, Guy Madison, Barton MacLane

Genres: Drama, History, Romance, War, Western
Budget: $300,000 (estimated)
Release date: October 16, 1951 (USA)


0:00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
0:01:41 Georgia 1861: Clay Clayburn and Will Denning, West Point friends, reunite in Georgia as the Civil War looms.
0:05:41 Clay professes his enduring love to Kathy Summers, now married to their mutual friend Braxton Summers.
0:14:32 Assigned a daring mission, Major Clayburn leads Confederate soldiers to fortify Devil's Mountain.
0:28:15 Kathy risks her safety to guide Clay's men through treacherous mountain caverns.
0:42:50 Union forces, led by Major Denning, prepare a counterattack against the Confederate stronghold.
0:57:10 Clay and Will, unaware of each other's presence, engage in a fierce artillery duel.
1:11:45 Kathy discovers the impending Union plan to use a naval gun and warns Clay.

sources.title: Drums In The Deep South ( 1951) James Craig Barbara Payton Guy Madison Western Movie
sources.description: Two old friends find themselves on opposite sides during the Civil War in a desperate battle atop an impregnable mountain.

metadata.Plot: Best friends Clay Clayburn and Will Denning graduate from West Point only to soon find themselves fighting on opposite sides of the Civil War. When the two men meet each other in combat, neither knows it as each is in an artillery position hundreds of yards from the other. However, the love of Clay's life, Kathy Summers, does know and tries desperately to save her two good friends from killing each other.
metadata.Writer: Philip Yordan, Sidney Harmon, Hollister Noble
metadata.Actors: James Craig, Barbara Payton, Guy Madison
